org.wattdepot.server.http.api

Class WattDepotComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Component
        • org.wattdepot.server.http.api.WattDepotComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class WattDepotComponent
extends org.restlet.Component
    WattDepotComponent - Main class to start the WattDepot Http API component of the WattDepotServer.
    Author:
    Cam Moore
